title: Leslie Jordan / Life in Recovery
description: Sean's shingles shot leaves him sickly but safeguarded. Priyanka struggles with staying serene. Leslie Jordan shares his story about growing up gay in the South and his stirring journey with sobriety.
author: info@hazymills.com (Hazy Mills Network)
